stories.text:
Github appears to be down. Unable to reach the site, perfom git operations, or even ping github.com

Statuspage shows everything as fine. Anyone else seeing this?

https://www.githubstatus.com/

stories.text:
https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30428142 was there originally, gained steam

https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30428788 then seemed to replace it

And the second post is only 2nd position, though it's clearly hugely impactful

What's going on that the algorithm downshifts the original and 2nd places the replacement?
